Content:: St Mary's are a GAA club from Ardee, County Louth, Ireland. The club fields Gaelic football teams in competitions organized by Louth GAA. The club was founded in 1928.[1] As of 2020, the club has competed in 27 Louth Senior Football Championship finals, winning 10. This Leinster GAA club related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
